salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Registered Physio) to LKR 350,000+ (Senior Physio/Clinic Owner) per month.
futureOutlook: With an aging population and a greater focus on sports and fitness, the demand for physiotherapy is on the rise. While hospital roles are common, the biggest growth area is in private practice. Many experienced physiotherapists open their own clinics, specializing in sports injuries, neurological rehab, or geriatric care.
